valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Irish Sea 988 expected Norwegian Basin 987 by midday tomorrow. Low Southeast Iceland 987 expected just west of Iceland 989 by same time
